item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "The more you are motivated by Love, The more Fearless & Free your action will be." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "In the unlikely story that is America, there has never been anything false about hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "It is wrong to think that love comes from long companionship and persevering courtship. Love is the offspring of spiritual affinity and unless that affinity is created in a moment, it will not be created for years or even generations." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "There is a saying in Tibetan, 'Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.' No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Because you are alive, everything is possible." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "One's own religion is after all a matter between oneself and one's Maker and no one else's." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "The appearance of things changes according to the emotions; and thus we see magic and beauty in them, while the magic and beauty are really in ourselves." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "We must be willing to let go of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Joe Darion
item.description:
"It is the mission of each true knight... His duty... nay, his privilege! To dream the impossible dream, To fight the unbeatable foe, To bear with unbearable sorrow To run where the brave dare not go; To right the unrightable wrong.
To love, pure and chaste, from afar, To try, when your arms are too weary, To reach the unreachable star!
This is my Quest to follow that star, No matter how hopeless, no matter how far, To fight for the right Without question or pause, To be willing to march into hell For a heavenly cause!
And I know, if I'll only be true To this glorious Quest, That my heart will lie peaceful and calm When I'm laid to my rest.
And the world will be better for this, That one man, scorned and covered with scars, Still strove, with his last ounce of courage, To reach the unreachable stars!" -- Joe Darion

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Jacqueline add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "â€¨Loneliness is the human condition. Cultivate it. The way it tunnels into you allows your soul room to grow. Never expect to outgrow loneliness. Never hope to find people who will understand you, someone to fill that space. An intelligent, sensitive person is the exception, the very great exception. If you expect to find people who will understand you, you will grow murderous with disappointment. The best you'll ever do is to understand yourself, know what it is that you want, and not let the cattle stand in your way." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "I know God won't give me anything I can't handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "I sincerely believe that banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies, and that the principle of spending money to be paid by posterity, under the name of funding, is but swindling futurity on a large scale." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Bill Maher
item.description:
"The problem is that the people with the most ridiculous ideas are always the people who are most certain of them."
(<i>The Decider</i>, July 21, 2007)" -- Bill Maher

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Tell me, what is it you plan to do with your one wild and precious life?" -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Mary Oliver
item.description: "Hello, sun in my face. Hello you who made the morning and spread it over the fields...Watch, now, how I start the day in happiness, in kindness." -- Mary Oliver

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Insane people are always sure that they are fine. It is only the sane people who are willing to admit that they are crazy." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Hafiz
item.description:
"Admit something.
Everyone you see, you say to them "Love me."
Of course you do not do this out loud: Otherwise, Someone would call the cops.
Still, though, think about this, This great pull in us to connect.
Why not become the one Who lives with a full moon in each eye That is always saying,
With that sweet moon Language
What every other eye in this world Is dying to Hear?" -- Hafiz

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.." -- John Milton

item.title: Jacqueline add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth." -- Pablo Picasso
